name: Uesugi Kenshin
ability: Moderately increases damage dealt when Takeda Shingen is on the team.
All melee allies take slightly less damage and deal slightly more damage.

additional_data.voice_actor: Sarah Emi Bridcutt (ブリドカット セーラ 恵美)
additional_data.description: The spirit of a daimyo from the Warring States Period who was knows as the god of war. She can easily beat foes even when she's outnumbered, so her battles never end in a draw. She's blessed with both beauty and strength. Uesugi Kenshin presented as male when he was alive, but due to extenuating circumstances, he took on a female form as a spirit.

skill: "Do you understand how momentous it is to stand before someone like me?"
summon: "You there! Allow me to offer my assistance!"
limit_break: "At this rate, it's only a matter of time before they fall."
